title: Shipwrecked
desc: A 130-person hackathon on an island organized by Hack Club. I spent 60 hours building projects to qualify and another 64 hours to get a full travel stipend.

title: Siege
desc: A Hackathon organizied by Hack Club where you get a Framework Laptop if you ship a project that you spent atleast 10 hours on every week for 10 weeks (+ 4 prep weeks).
